title: Tadej Pogačar down but not out after stage 5 time loss: ‘We’re still in the game’
content:
UAE-Team Emirates management on letting Hindley off the leash and defending champion Vingegaard's 'impressive' strength.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar down but not out after stage 5 time loss: ‘We’re still in the game’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
